mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_adr (mbr_sn, adr_ttl, adr_cn, adr_st,rgtr_dt,adr_lat,adr_lon) VALUES ( #{mbr_sn}, #{adr_ttl}, #{adr_cn}, #{adr_st}, #{rgtr_dt}, #{adr_lat}, #{adr_lon} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.mbr_sn,B.adr_cn,B.adr_st FROM tb_mbr AS A LEFT JOIN tb_adr AS B ON A.mbr_sn = B.mbr_sn WHERE B.dft_yn = 'Y'
